name: B. Beautiful Array
statement:
Stanley defines the beauty of an array a of length n, which contains ,
as follows:
sum
limits_{i = 1}^{n}
left
lfloor
frac{a_{i}}{k}
right
rfloor, which means that we divide each element by k, round it down, and
sum up the resulting values.Stanley told Sam the integer k and asked him
to find an array a of n non-negative integers, such that the beauty is
equal to b and the sum of elements is equal to s. Help Sam find any of
the arrays satisfying the conditions above.
